outline:
1. to play or strike strings, play a stringed instrument
    1. (Qal)
      1. player (participle)
    2. (Piel)
      1. to play
        1. player, minstrel (participle)
kjv_def: player on instruments, sing to the stringed instruments, melody, ministrel, play(-er, -ing).
strongs_def: properly, to thrum, i.e. beat atune with the fingers; expectation. to play on astringed instrument; hence (generally), to make music
